query:
ALTER TABLE notifications MODIFY COLUMN type ENUM(
  'POSITION_OPENED',
  'POSITION_CLOSED',
  'RISK_LIMIT_WARNING',
  'DAILY_LIMIT_REACHED',
  'CONNECTION_LOST',
  'CONNECTION_RESTORED',
  'EMERGENCY_STOP',
  'COST_WARNING',
  'COST_EXCEEDED',
  'MONTHLY_LIMIT_REACHED',
  'PERFORMANCE_DROP',
  'FINETUNING_SUCCESS',
  'FINETUNING_FAILED',
  'ROLLOUT_PHASE_UPDATE',
  'CHECKPOINT_SAVED'
) NOT NULL;
